course_title: Special Laboratory Topics in Chemistry: Catalysis in Org.Chem.Reaction
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 6 / Seats Avail: 0Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: In this advanced laboratory students will develop expertise in carrying out chemical reactions with the aid of a catalyst in order to prepare organic and inorganic compounds. Students will investigate catalysis under chemical and biological conditions, and will continue to use spectroscopy as the main tool in the characterization of products from each chemical reaction. In this course students will search the scientific literature and exercise their writing skills.
course_description: A laboratory course for advanced students on topics of current interest in chemistry.
prerequisites: CHEM 300L or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
